name: CandyVenture
description: Berry and his friends count on you! Evil monsters invaded the candy world and stole all the candies. But you and our heroes are here to save their candy world! Use their powers to destroy the monsters in this cozy 2D adventure game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Something that can boot up your system Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: You can read this? Good! DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 75 MB available space Sound Card: Something that can make noises, pew pew.
